body.p: If you are installing a named-user license on multiple machines, or you are an administrator registering named-user or floating licenses for multiple users, you can avoid having to open on each machine by registering the license using a text file or XML file that contains the license information. If you are using floating licenses that are managed by a license server, you cannot use this method to register licenses.
To register licenses using a text file:

ol.li: Copy the license key to a file named licensekey.txt and place it in the installation folder of lib sub-folder of the installation folder.

body.p: To register licenses using an XML file:

ol.li: Register the license on one computer using the normal license registration procedure.
Copy the license.xml file from the preferences directory on that computer to lib sub-folder of the installation folder on each installation to be registered.
